prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with bright green skin and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a tiny caterpillar Pokemon that blends into grassy environments.
Design a Pokemon that evolves into a beautiful butterfly, starting as a small green worm.
Show me a Pokemon that loves to munch on leaves and is often found in forests.
Generate a cute bug-type Pokemon with a round body and large, expressive eyes.
Make a visual concept of a Pokemon that can camouflage with its surroundings.
Give me an idea for a beginner's Pokemon that is friendly and easy to train.
